name: Codename: V10L37
description:
• Can be played with mouse & keyboard or gamepad controls.
  • Non-linear exploration of the stages.
  • Open environments in the stages and hub world.

Explore a hostile environment filled with strange flora and alien lifeforms. Navigate the strange environment of planet V10L37, avoiding enemies and interacting with the space around you in your journey to repair the ship. Stranded, you are left with no choice but to explore your surrounding area, looking for the broken off parts of your ship.  However, your life support is low, and you have to be quick to find the parts before it runs out.

Planet V10L37 has a wide variety of environments. With dark ravines, filled with glowing mushrooms to light your way, dense forests, lined with vines from every tree, and floating environments, with air currents that carry you across the gap, filling every corner of the planet. As you navigate these environments, you'll encounter a variety of creatures native to the planet, attacking on sight of a foreign object (you). You must be careful on your path to repairing the ship, since if you get struck, or stuck, your life support will fade, and you along with it.
